name: Bricks and Balls: slide games
description:
Control the ball to avoid other deadly colours obstacles

Drag your finger to move the ball. Do not touch other colours obstacles, that is it!

Very easy to play but very hard to finish the game

How far can you reach?

Game Features:

- Free to play

- Endless gameplay

- Simple swipe control
